LedgerKey.description: The [LedgerKey](https://github.com/stellar/stellar-xdr/blob/v22.0/Stellar-ledger-entries.x#L600) union corresponding to an existing ledger entry you want to retrieve (base64-encoded string).

LedgerKeys.description: An array of LedgerKeys. The maximum number of ledger keys accepted is 200.

LedgerEntry.description: Object containing information about an existing ledger entry.

key.description: The [LedgerKey](https://github.com/stellar/stellar-xdr/blob/v22.0/Stellar-ledger-entries.x#L600) corresponding to the ledger entry (base64 string).

lastModifiedLedgerSeq.description: The ledger sequence number of the last time this entry was updated.
